pages.text: Roughly Enough Items (REI) is a block, item, and recipe searching/viewing mod. $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/roughly-enough-items)Roughly Enough Items$(/l) on CurseForge. $(l)$(br)Advanced Search$()$(li)Mod: @[modname] Non-case sensitive, searching via mod, for example @create to search for items added by create.

$(li)Tooltip: #[text] Non-case sensitive, searching via tooltip, for example #protection to search for protection books.$(li)Tags: tag Non-case sensitive, searching via tags, for example $logs to search for logs.$(li)Quotes: Allowing spaces, for example "#protection iii" to search with spaces. $(li)Or: | Example apple|$logs to search for apples or logs.
